alert.note: Alert for Pike (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 26 at 8:48PM CDT until May 03 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri... Kaskaskia River at Carlyle. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Hannibal. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Clarksville. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.5 feet, State Route P east of Elsberry begins flooding just east of the levee. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 24.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 25.8 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Mississippi River Clarksville 25.0 24.7 Tue 8 pm 25.3 25.8 25.7 25.5 25.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
